Hi [Project Manager Name],

I hope you’re doing well. As discussed, here are the consolidated requirements and timeline for the Performance Tracking System (PTS) that SoftSync Systems will be developing for Acme Corp.

------------------------------------------------------------
PROJECT OVERVIEW
------------------------------------------------------------
Objective
• Deploy a robust Performance Tracking System (PTS) that enables real-time insight into individual and team performance while seamlessly integrating with Acme’s existing HR infrastructure.

Core Functionality
1. Real-Time Performance Metrics
   – KPIs to track: project completion rates, sales target attainment, customer-service response times, etc.
2. Customizable Dashboards
   – Role-based widgets so each user sees the metrics most relevant to them (e.g., sales managers: lead conversion & average deal size; customer-service leads: CSAT & ticket-resolution time).
3. HR System Integration
   – Tight connection with our current HRIS to align performance data with training records, role changes, and review cycles while maintaining employee privacy.

Key Milestones (Proposed)
• Development kick-off: early Q3 FY25 (next quarter)
• Internal MVP demo: end of Month 3
• Pilot phase: Months 4–9 (6-month duration) with iterative feedback loops
• Refinement & production roll-out plan: Month 10 onward (TBD based on pilot results)

Expected Deliverables from SoftSync
• Detailed technical specification & architecture diagram
• UI/UX prototypes and design system
• Data-mapping & integration plan for HRIS
• Security, privacy & compliance documentation (SOC 2 alignment, GDPR readiness, etc.)
• Pilot success criteria & post-pilot improvement roadmap

------------------------------------------------------------
NEXT STEPS
------------------------------------------------------------
1. Please confirm your resource allocation and availability for a project-kickoff call next week (Tue–Thu, 10:00-12:00 ET work best on our side).
2. Share any preliminary questions or additional information you need.
3. Identify the primary technical point-of-contact for the HRIS integration so we can loop them in early.

You can review the live project outline here (read-only link):
https://www.notion.so/Performance-Tracking-System-Project-Outline-1f00dc8fa0db81b7aa12df5e4e49213d

Thank you, and I look forward to collaborating on a successful delivery.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Acme Corp. – Product Lead
[phone] | [email]
